name: Swipe
display_help: A fast Claw attack that shreds your opponent.

name: Strike
display_help: Claw Strike is a standard claw attack against a targeted foe.

name: Slash
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Slash attack

name: Spin
display_help: The Crey Cloned Hero spins around with claws extended, slicing up all the nearby enemies.

name: Eviscerate
display_help: The Crey Cloned Hero spins and slashes around violently, attacking all nearby foes in a wide arc in front of him. Eviscerate is so deadly, that there is a chance of dealing extra damage!
display_short_help: Melee Cone Lethal, Very High DMG, Special

name: Focus
display_help: The Crey Cloned Hero can project a burst of focused power. Focus only travels a short distance, but it can also knock down foes.

name: Focused_Fighting
display_help: The Crey Cloned Hero can Focus his mind to evade many attacks.

name: Unstoppable
display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

name: Gloom
display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing his Accuracy. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

name: Tenebrous_Tentacles
display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their Accuracy. Recharge: Slow

name: Twilight_Grasp
display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's Accuracy and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate

name: Night_Fall
display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced Accuracy. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Fearsome_Stare
display_help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow

name: Torrent
display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack deals minimal Negative Energy damage, but sends foes flying and reduces their Accuracy. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Petrifying_Gaze
display_help: Petrifies a single targeted foe with a terrifying gaze. The victim is Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow

name: Life_Drain
display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce his Accuracy. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Dark_Servant
display_help: Summons a Dark Servant to your aid. The Dark Servant possesses an assortment of dark powers to weaken your foes. The summoned entity is not a willing servant, and it is only your power that binds it in this realm. The Dark Servant can be buffed and healed. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Summon Dark Servant: Ranged Debuff Special

name: Blackstar
display_help: You can unleash a devastating blast of Negative Energy around yourself, dealing massive damage and severely reducing affected foes' Accuracy. This power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long

name: Energy_Punch
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Whirling_Hands
display_help: Launches a dizzying attack against everything in a nearby area.

name: Bone_Smasher
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Total_Focus
display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

name: Power_Bolt
display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Dull_Pain
display_help: A Crey Cloned Hero can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

name: Moment_of_Glory
display_help: When you activate this power, you lose almost all of your Hit Points and can no longer Regenerate Hit Points, However, you become Resistant to all damage types except Psionics, recover Endurance more quickly, and are highly resistant to Sleep, Disorient, Immobilization, and Hold effects. Recharge: Very Long

name: Neutrino_Bolt
display_help: A very quick, but low damage attack. Neutrino Blast can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

name: X-Ray_Beam
display_help: You can emit a beam of X-Ray energy from your eyes, dealing moderate Energy damage. This attack can bypass some defenses and can reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Enervating_Field
display_help: You have been exposed to an Enervating Field of radiation. Your damage and damage resistance are reduced.

name: Electron_Haze
display_help: A short range conical blast of free electrons. This attack can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. It can also knock some targets down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Lingering_radiation
display_help: You can emit Lingering Radiation that reduces the attack rate, movement speed, and Regeneration rate of the target, and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow

name: Cosmic_Burst
display_help: Cosmic Burst smashes the target with cosmic particles. The attack is very short range, but the damage is devastating and can leave most targets Disoriented and with reduced Defense. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Radiant_Aura
display_help: You can use Radiant Aura to heal some of your wounds, and the wounds of your group. This power has a small radius, so your allies need to be near you if they wish to be affected. Recharge: Moderate

name: Choking_Cloud
display_help: While active, you generate toxic radioactive gas around yourself. Any nearby foes may be overcome by the gas, leaving them choking and helpless. Recharge: Long

name: Neutron_Bomb
display_help: This devastating attack lobs an explosive sphere of deadly radiation, damaging the target and all nearby foes. Neutron Bomb can bypass some of a target's defenses and reduce the target's Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Atomic_Blast
display_help: Your Defense has been reduced and left you helpless by an Atomic Blast.

name: Aeon_Special
display_help: NEED TEXT
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG), +DMG, +ACC

display_help: Your Attack and Movement speed are reduced by the Spines. The Toxins may leave you immobilized.

name: Temp_Invulnerability
display_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long

name: Elude
display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow

name: Bash
display_help: You Bash with your mace dealing moderate Smashing damage and minor Toxic damage over time.
display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Minor Disorient

name: Pulverize
display_help: You Pulverize with your mace dealing high Smashing damage and minor Toxic damage over time.
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Minor Disorient

name: Clobber
display_help: You Clobber your foe's head in order to Disorient him. This attack does little damage on its own, but can leave most opponents Disoriented for a very long time.
display_short_help: Melee, Minor DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Disorient

name: Whirling_Mace
display_help: You swing your mace in a circle all around you, attacking everyone in melee range. Your Whirling Mace deals moderate damage and minor Toxic damage over time, and has a chance to Disorient every foe you hit.
display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Minor Disorient

name: Crowd_Control
display_help: You swing your mace in a wide arc in front of you. This attack strikes all foes within melee range, deals them serious damage and minor Toxic damage over time, and knocks them down.
display_short_help: Melee (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Knockback

name: Poisonous_Ray_Burst

name: Mace_Beam_Volley

display_short_help: Cone Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

name: Mace_Beam_Blast

This non-lethal device deals no damage and does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Web can bring down flying entities and halts jumping.

name: Cocoon

name: Indomitable_Will
display_help: Activating this power greatly boosts your resistance to Sleep, Disorient, Fear and Hold effects for 90 seconds. Indomitable Will also grants a high defense to Psionic based attacks. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self Res( Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Fear). DEF(Psionics)

name: Mind_Over_Body
display_help: When you toggle on this power, you empower your Mind Over Body to become highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Psionic damage. You must have Mental Blast or Indomitable Will before selecting this power. Recharge: Fast

name: Hide
display_help: Hide makes you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. Very low Endurance cost.

name: Placate
display_help: Allow you to trick a foe to no longer attack you. A Successful Placate will also Hide you. This Hide is very brief, and offers no Defense bonus, but it will allow you to deliver a Critical Hit or an Assassins Strike. However, if you attack a Placated Foe, he will be able to attack you back. Recharge: Long
